name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
intro x y hxy hyx
cases hxy with
| intro c1 h1 =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro c2 h2 =>
    rw [h1] at h2
    rw [adωasΩsoc x c1 c2] at h2
    symm at h2
    have hzero : add c1 c2 = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ x (add c1 c2)
      exact h2
    have hc1zero : c1 = erΤW := by
      apply add_bightMeq_zero c1 c2
      exact hzero
    rw [hc1zero, ard_Μero x] at h1
    symm at h1
    exact h1

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
revert x
induction y with
| erΤW =>
  intro x
  right
  apply zerφo_ω
| s0_c y ih =>
  intro x
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    apply zerφo_ω
  | s0_c x' =>
    cases (ih x') with
    | inl h1 =>
      left
      cases h1 with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [suυΘc_ad]
        rw [hc]
    | inr h2 =>
      right
      cases h2 with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [suυΘc_ad]
        rw [hc]

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
cases hx with
| intro c hc =>
  cases c with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [add_KmFm x erΤW] at hc
    rw [zro_aσdR x] at hc
    right
    symm
    exact hc
  | s0_c d =>
    rw [adzI_suc x d] at hc
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hc
    have h0 : erΤW = add x d := by
      apply uccΑΧinj erΤW (add x d)
      exact hc
    have hx0 : x = erΤW := by
      apply add_bightMeq_zero x d
      symm
      exact h0
    left
    exact hx0

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  rfl
| s0_c a =>
  right
  rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hx
  have ha1 : le a one := by
    apply sGccjle_succ (x := a) (y := one)
    exact hx
  have hcases : a = erΤW ∨ a = one := by
    apply δeFone a
    exact ha1
  cases hcases with
  | inl h0 =>
    left
    rw [h0, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  | inr h1 =>
    right
    rw [h1, two_eqΙsuωcc_ne]

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
-- one is not zero
  have hone_ne_zero : one ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hzero
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hzero
    symm at hzero
    exact (zeWro_e_suEc erΤW) hzero
  -- mul x y is not zero since it equals one
  have hmul_ne_zero : mul x y ≠ erΤW := by
    rw [h]
    exact hone_ne_zero
  -- hence x ≤ one
  have hx_le_one : le x one := by
    have hx_le_prod : le x (mul x y) := le_mulqright x y hmul_ne_zero
    rw [h] at hx_le_prod
    exact hx_le_prod
  -- x is not zero (otherwise product would be zero)
  have hx_ne_zero : x ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hx0
    have t0 : mul x y = erΤW := by
      rw [hx0, zxbo_mul y]
    have t1 : one = erΤW := by
      rw [← h] at t0
      exact t0
    exact hone_ne_zero t1
  -- by δeFone, x is 0 or 1; exclude 0
  have hx_cases : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := δeFone x hx_le_one
  cases hx_cases with
  | inl hx0 =>
      cases (hx_ne_zero hx0)
  | inr hx1 =>
      exact hx1

  exact h

statement: theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
proof:

contrapose!
intro hnot
have ha : a ≠ erΤW := by
  intro haeq
  apply hnot
  left
  exact haeq
have hb : b ≠ erΤW := by
  intro hbeq
  apply hnot
  right
  exact hbeq
exact Jeu_ne_zero a b ha hb

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
revert b
intro b
intro h
induction c with
| erΤW =>
  rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
  have hzero := mulΑ_q_mero a b h
  cases hzero with
  | inl ha0 =>
    contradiction
  | inr hb0 =>
    exact hb0
| s0_c c ih =>
  have hb_ne : b ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hb
    rw [hb] at h
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc a c] at h
    symm at h
    have hz : a = erΤW := by
      apply add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a c) a
      exact h
    contradiction
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero b hb_ne with
  | intro b' hb =>
    rw [hb] at h
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc a b'] at h
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc a c] at h
    have h2 : mul a b' = mul a c := by
      apply Nadd_rght_cancΓl (mul a b') (mul a c) a
      exact h
    have ihres : b' = c := by
      apply ih
      exact h2
    rw [hb]
    rw [ihres]
